Articles.Content:
Are there any tricks to parts to actually hook up inside a cargo bay (the MK2 bays to be more specific)? I can't seem to figure out what can or can't connect to the inside points.

This is in Career mode, not super far. Are there any parts that make it easier that I might not have yet?

Thanks for any help.

Edited January 1, 2015 by Repseki
Hold "Alt" while placing the part. It will stick to the connection node.

To be more specific, alt disables surface-attach, so any situation where you want to stick something to the attachement point but it keeps "grabbing" the surface of something else, you can use this for.
